item.title: Automate deployment from Github to Windows Azure
item.description:
There are many options to choose from to automate deployment. On my first web app,Â I used Github together with Windows Azure. In this post I will highlight the problems I faced and how I got over them. The first, and most important lesson I learned was this â€“

KeepÂ yourÂ private stuff out of source control
